trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 抽象 WCF 扩展类，用于指定自定义发现服务或获取已发布的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension> and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: 从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension> 中派生一个类，并重写 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> 方法以返回自定义发现服务。

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: 将派生的类添加到承载可发现服务的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 扩展中。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> 时，该行为循环访问服务主机中的扩展，并查找 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension>。

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一个扩展，则调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> 以获取自定义发现服务。

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到扩展，则使用默认的发现服务实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以返回自定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>打开服务主机，如果此方法返回时引发 `null`

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 获取已发布终结点的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 已发布终结点的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: 仅应在成功打开 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 之后访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> 处于 <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> 状态时，将生成 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> 并将其添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The service host to attach the extension to.
trans-unit.target: 要将扩展附加到的服务主机。

trans-unit.source: Attaches the extension to the specified service host.
trans-unit.target: 将扩展附加在指定的服务主机。

trans-unit.source: The service host to detach from.
trans-unit.target: 将与其分离的服务主机。

trans-unit.source: Overload this method to allow the extension to be detached from its service host.
trans-unit.target: 重载此方法以允许扩展与其服务主机分离。

trans-unit.source: The base class implementation of this method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> that indicates discovery service extensions cannot be detached.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的基类实现引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>，该异常指示无法分离发现服务扩展。
